Aya Till Tandon

Part 1A

Age: 16

Identity: Girl

Expression: Sporty Feminine

Orientation: Too busy looking for their limit

Drive: Try everything

Value: A person is defined by the height of their limit

Line: Giving up is death

Goal: Discover their limit

Affiliation: Watchlist

Category: Constructor

== Regeneration The user can heal any injury sustained to their body, with some control over how it is healed, including but not limited to control over what parts are healed when, whether to regrow parts as longer than they previously were, and what is defined as a part to be healed, though all healing must make use of nutrients in blood that can reach the injured area.

The user believes their power lets them heal

Weapon: Weighted Clothing

Part 1B

Affiliation: Peacekeepers
